Class Snake

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Mover
        • Snake

  • public class Snake
extends Mover
    This creates the attributes for the fore runner. This class sts attributes such as the length as well as the type of forerunner.
    Version:
    May 12, 2016
    Author:
    Kevin Ge

    • Constructor Detail

      • Snake

        public Snake(int type)
        Constructor for Runner (called Snake). Sets gif for animation, Gunner for 1st, Runner for every 4th, and transparent (for spacing) for all else.
        Parameters:
        type - of Runner

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act()
        Runs animations. Shoots if space is held. Sets Runners' image to those of Gunners if TripleShot is picked up. Sets killable to true if invincible for 4 seconds already.
        Overrides:
        act in class greenfoot.Actor

      • shoot

        public void shoot()
        Shoots one bullet forward. Shoots triple if power up tripleShots is picked up. By Lawrence Cheng and David Magnusson

      • invincible

        public void invincible()
        Sets Runner's killable to false, which is checked by other killers (Brick and Enemy)

      • isKillable

        public boolean isKillable()
        Returns if Runner is killable for other killers (Brick and Enemy)
        Returns:
        if Runner is killable

      • tripleShot

        public void tripleShot()
        Triple shot powerup. Sets onlyOnce to true to Runner turns into Gunners once (stalls animation otherwise).

      • setShots

        public void setShots(int shot)
        Sets the number of shots for this Runner
        Parameters:
        shot - to be set to
